# solana_health (Data Source)

[(JSON RPC)](https://solana.com/docs/rpc/http/gethealth) Get the health of the Solana network

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "solana_health" "testnet" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **healthy** (Boolean) Whether or not the network is healthy.
